Comment.MultiLanguageText: First Byte address of 4 byte address space
True = process valve is in end position defined by activated pilot valve.
True = process valve is in end position defined by deactivated pilot valve.
Output device error event has appeared
Output port qualifer proces data valid

AttributeList.Text:
Data words uses in function
HMI_CMD, dw X - command word from SCADA Bit 0 = auto Bit 1 = Manuel deactivate Bit 2 = Manuel activate Bit 3 = Locate Bit 4 = Teach Bit 5 = spare Bit 6 = spare
HMI_INFO, dw X - info word to SCADA Bit 0 = activated Bit 1 = changing Bit 2 = faulty Bit 3 = auto_man, Manuel = 1 Bit 4 = man_on_off Bit 5 = Reset_FB Bit 6 = ManualSelected Bit 7 = Set_FB Bit 8 = Locate Active Bit 9 = spare Bit 10 = spare Bit 11 = spare Bit 12 = spare Bit 13 = spare Bit 14 = fb_error - Alarm feedback error Bit 15 = spare
OperationalState: 0=Initialisation,1=Teach function,2=Normal Operation,3=Safety end position,4=MANUAL Operation State,5= Teach in Operation

LineComment.Text: if commamd bits = 0 then no commands
Show Reset FB in "Item Info & Operation" popup
Show Set FB in "Item Info & Operation" popup
